name: Robert Brian Haynes
title: Professor Emeritus, Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact
overview: I am a clinical epidemiologist/internist with experience in clinical care (diabetes), clinical informatics and health services research in general, and practitioner performance and patient adherence in particular. My research activities fall in the domain of knowledge translation research, at the interface between health care research and clinical practice, including information retrieval, critical appraisal of evidence, summarization, synthesis, dissemination, and application of evidence in support of health care.
